title: 'Great Pillow'
body: 'The pillow is soft and quite comfortable to sleep on.  The only (minor) problem was that it smelled of industrial chemicals on the first day. But upon leaving it in open for a day
column5: the smell went off.  Just make sure that once you open it from the packaging
column6: leave it for a day to let the industrial smell to go away.  I am very happy with the product and would buy this again.'
